localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: In one tap, remove the background and compose an image that will showcase a product or a model. PhotoRoom is an image editing app that lets you capture, edit, and mix images by editing objects.
blogPost.body: In one tap, remove the background and compose an image that will showcase a product or a model. PhotoRoom is an image editing app that lets you capture, edit, and mix images by editing objects.
blogPost.title: PhotoRoom Android - Remove background & create pro photos
blogPost.author: alban

localize.description: 只需轻轻一点，即可移除背景并合成将展示产品或模型的图像。PhotoRoom是一款图像编辑应用程序，允许您通过编辑对象来捕获、编辑和混合图像。
localize.tagline: 删除背景并创建专业照片

localize.description: 只需輕輕一點，即可移除背景併合成將展示產品或模型的圖像。PhotoRoom是一款圖像編輯應用程序，允許您通過編輯對象來捕獲、編輯和混合圖像。
localize.tagline: 刪除背景並創建專業照片

previous.excerpt: Follow @Millions on Twitter, pick 6 numbers, and if you match a weekly drawing, you've won $1,000,000. Drawings are weekly and will run for 10 weeks.
previous.title: Millions - Follow @Millions. Match 6 #s. Win our VC's money.

localize.description: 在微博上关注@百万，选择6个数字，如果你符合每周的抽奖，你就赢得了100万美元. 抽奖是每周一次，将持续10周。
localize.tagline: 关注@百万。匹配6个#s。赢我们VC的钱。

localize.description: 在微博上關注@百萬，選擇6個數字，如果你符合每週的抽獎，你就贏得了100萬美元. 抽獎是每週一次，將持續10周。
localize.tagline: 關注@百萬。匹配6個#s。贏我們VC的錢。

next.excerpt: We connect project management software with MS Teams, so you could create tasks and meeting minutes without typing during the call. Focus on conversation, ask call participants for detailed explanations and simply mark from transcription all that’s important.
next.title: isLucid - Boost your online meetings efficiency

localize.description: 我们将项目管理软件与MS Teams连接起来，因此您可以在通话过程中无需打字就能创建任务和会议记录。专注于对话，要求电话参与者进行详细解释，并简单地从转录中标记所有重要的内容。
localize.tagline: 提高您的在线会议效率

localize.description: 我們將項目管理軟件與MS Teams連接起來，因此您可以在通話過程中無需打字就能創建任務和會議記錄。專注於對話，要求電話參與者進行詳細解釋，並簡單地從轉錄中標記所有重要的內容。
localize.tagline: 提高您的在線會議效率
